Sprint_Sep_2022.Name: Add IsTransfer Col to Safe
Sprint_Sep_2022.Command: ALTER TABLE SalesManagement.Safes ADD IsTransfered bit;

Sprint_Sep_2022.Name: Add IsTransfer Col to PurechasesHeaders
Sprint_Sep_2022.Command: ALTER TABLE SalesManagement.PurechasesHeaders ADD IsTransfered bit;

Sprint_Sep_2022.Name: Add IsTransfer Col to OrderHeader
Sprint_Sep_2022.Command: ALTER TABLE SalesManagement.OrderHeaders ADD IsTransfered bit;

Sprint_Sep_2022.Name: Add Balance Col to Farmer table
Sprint_Sep_2022.Command: ALTER TABLE SalesManagement.Farmers ADD Balance decimal Not Null CONSTRAINT df_Balance_Farmer DEFAULT 0 WITH VALUES

Sprint_Sep_2022.Name: Add Balance Col to Sellet table
Sprint_Sep_2022.Command: ALTER TABLE SalesManagement.Sellers ADD Balance decimal Not Null CONSTRAINT df_Balance_Seller DEFAULT 0 WITH VALUES
